naslov: Okrug Gornji, stambena zgrada s bazenom i pogledom, unosna, 780 m2 (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Okrug Gornji, velika stambena kuća bruto površine od 780 kvadrata na 3 etaže. Vrlo atraktivna pozicija, blizu mora, plaže i svih sadržaja, te s prekrasnim pogledom na more sa svih etaža uključujući i prizemlje. Nekretnina sadrži 6 raskošnih stanova, sa svake strane po 3 tlocrtno identičnih, koji su zrcalno simetrični s 3 stana na drugoj strani. Svaki stan nudi dnevni boravak, kuhinju i blagovaonicu, po dvije spavaće sobe, dvije kupaonice, hodnik i degažman, ukupne podne površine od 85.38 m2. Svakom stanu pripada i lođa od 10.96 m2, natkriveni balkon od 2.20 m2 te po jedno parkirno mjesto od 13.75 m2, što sve po stanu pruža 97.45 m2 neto stambene površine s uračunatim koeficijentima. Stanovi su iznimno prostrani, s vrlo komfornim prostorijama i vrlo održavani i očuvani, novije gradnje, bez ikakvih nedostataka. Koristili su se samo 2-3 mjeseca u godini u turističke svrhe. Potpuno su namješteni i opremljeni, uključujući klima uređaje u svim sobama, električne grijalice u kupaonicama, protuprovalna i protupožarna vrata, odličnu hidro i termo izolaciju, PVC stolariju s dvoslojnim izo staklima, grilje na svim prozorima i balkonskim vratima, parkete u spavaćim sobama i dnevnom boravku, perilice posuđa i rublja, satelitsku TV, bežični internet i vrtnu garnituru za lođu. Rezidenciju krasi i moderan bazen od 24 m2, također s pogledom na more, kojeg opslužuje potpuno autonoman robot za čišćenje površine vode, te samih stijenki i dna bazena. Kuća (građevinski izvedena u dva susjedna objekta) se nalazi na odličnoj lokaciji, u relativno mirnom okružju i blizu mora sa svim popratnim objektima i atrakcijama nadohvat ruke. Dolazi s uhodanim i vrlo unosnim poslom turističkog iznajmljivanja. --- Okrug Gornji, large residential house sized 780 gross square meters over 3 floors. Very attractive position, close to the sea, the beach and all facilities, and with a beautiful view of the sea from all floors, including the ground floor. The property contains 6 luxurious apartments, 3 on each side with identical floor plans, which are mirror-symmetrical to 3 apartments on the other side. Each apartment offers living room, kitchen and dining room, two bedrooms, two bathrooms, hallway and storage room, with a total floor area of 85.38 m2. Each apartment also entails loggia of 10.96 m2, covered balcony of 2.20 m2 and one parking space of 13.75 m2, which all provide 97.45 m2 of net living space per apartment with calculated coefficients. The apartments are extremely spacious, with very comfortable rooms and are very well maintained and preserved, of recent construction, without any defects. They were used only 2-3 months a year for tourist purposes. They are fully furnished and equipped, including air conditioning units in all rooms, electric heaters in the bathrooms, security and fire-resistant doors, excellent hydro and thermal insulation, PVC carpentry with double-layered insulating glass, shutters on all windows and balcony doors, parquet floors in the bedrooms and living room, dishwasher and washing machine, satellite TV, wireless internet and garden furniture for the loggia. The residence also features a modern swimming pool of 24 m2, also with sea view, which is served by a fully autonomous robot for cleaning the surface of the water, as well as the walls and bottom of the pool. The house (constructed of two adjacent buildings) is located in an excellent location, in a relatively quiet environment and close to the sea with all accompanying facilities and attractions within easy reach. It comes with a well-established and very lucrative tourist rental business.
